thread.title: Close call: severe storms possible overnight depending on track of storm complex
thread.title_full: Close call: severe storms possible overnight depending on track of storm complex

author: @WLOX
title: Close call: severe storms possible overnight depending on track of storm complex
text: Updated: 1 hour ago| Some of South MS got clobbered by some early morning severe thunderstorms. As our severe risk ends, can't completely rule out a few AM pop-up showers before a front arrives and dries us up later. Click and watch the forecast video for details. Updated: 15 hours ago| Eric's First Alert Forecast May 9, 2024 Updated: 20 hours ago| Heat index has hit the 100s for parts of South MS today thanks to the jungle-like mugginess! Scattered t-storms will be possible by tomorrow AM. And then, a drier feel arrives with a cool front heading into the weekend. Click and watch the forecast video for details. Updated: May. 9, 2024 at 6:51 AM CDT| High temps today and tomorrow will likely be around 90. Showers & t-storms possible tonight. Less humid air tomorrow PM makes it feel less hot. Looks pleasant & refreshingly dry on Saturday. Click and watch the forecast video for details. Updated: May. 8, 2024 at 10:35 PM CDT| Eric's First Alert Forecast May 8, 2024
